verbose_text: Furthermore, because phosphorylation of PABP1 in the proline rich linker region is necessary for self-interaction (XREF_FIG), it suggests that the phosphorylation of PABP1 may promote cooperative binding to the poly (A) sequence, as in the case of human PABP1, which self-interacts through the proline rich linker, thereby binding cooperatively to the poly (A) sequence.
